Document:
##Burgers - all recipes use the Microwave.
-Appendix Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Human Appendix for 10 seconds -Bacon Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Bacon + 2 Cheese Wedges for 10 seconds -Baseball Burger = 1 Bun + Baseball Bat for 10 seconds -Bearger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Bear Meat for 10 seconds -Big Bite Burger = 1 Bun + 2 Raw Meat + 1 Cheese wedge + 1 Tomato + 2 Onion Slices for 15 seconds -Brain Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Brain for 10 seconds -Cat Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Meat + 1 Cat Ears cosmetic for 10 seconds -Cheese Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Meat + Cheese Wedge for 10 seconds -Clown Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Clown Mask for 10 seconds -Corger = 1 Bun + 1 Prime-Cut Corgi Meat for 10 seconds -Crab Burger = 1 Bun + 2 Crab Meat for 10 seconds -Crazy Hamburger = 1 Bun + 2 Raw Meat + 2 Cheese Wedges + 1 Chili + 1 Cabbage + 1 Green Crayon + 1 Flare + 15u Olive Oil for 15 seconds -Empowered Burger = 1 Bun + 2 Plasma Sheets for 10 seconds -Fillet-o-Carp Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Carp Fillet + 1 Cheese Wedge for 10 seconds -Five Alarm Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Meat + 3 Chili for 10 seconds -Ghost Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Ectoplasm for 10 seconds -Human Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Human Meat for 10 seconds -Jelly Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Amanita Jelly for 10 seconds -Mime Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Mime Mask for 10 seconds -Plain Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Meat for 10 seconds -Rat Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Rat Meat for 10 seconds -RoBurger = 1 Bun + 1 Capacitor for 10 seconds -Soylent Burger = 1 Bun + 2 Cheese Wedges + 2 Soybeans for 10 seconds -Spell Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Wizard Hat for 10 seconds -Super Bite Burger = 1 Bun + 2 Raw Meat + 2 Cheese Wedges + 2 Tomatoes + 2 Eggs + 5u Table Salt for 25 seconds -Tofu Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Tofu Slice for 10 seconds -Xeno Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Xeno Meat for 10 seconds -Mothroach Burger = 1 Bun + 1 Mothroach for 5 seconds
##Sandwiches - all recipes use the Microwave.
-Chicken Sandwich = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Chicken Meat + 5u Mayo for 10 seconds -Duck Sandwich = 1 Bun + 1 Raw Duck Meat + 1 Cheese Wedge for 10 seconds -McGuffin = 1 Bun + 1 Cheese Wedge + 2 Eggs for 10 seconds -BBQ Rib Sandwich = 1 Bun + 1 BBQ Ribs + 1 Onion Slice for 10 seconds
